snippet: "Active users" add up in Facebook's prospectus, but some of those clicks aren't on the Web site.
abstract: "Active users" add up in Facebook's prospectus, but some of those clicks aren't on the Web site.
lead_paragraph: On the first page of Facebook's prospectus for its sale of stock to the public, it pegs the number of its "monthly active users" at a whopping 845 million people. The social networking site arrives at an even more astounding number when it comes to "daily active users": 483 million people.

headline.main: Those Millions on Facebook? Some May Not Actually Visit
